intro: Psychotria stenostegia, commonly known as the narrow-stemmed psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves with a glossy surface and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. The plant's botanical features make it an important subject in ecological and medicinal studies.
